conbody.p: (a) Consolidation determinations are only required for contracts awarded and performed in the United States and Outlying Territories.

The determination must include the acquisition strategy information required in FAR 7.107-2, to include supporting documentation that consolidation is necessary and justified when the expected benefits do not meet the thresholds for a substantial benefit but are critical to the agencyâ€™s mission success; and the procurement strategy provides for maximum practicable participation by small business. When preparing these documents clearly identify the consolidation determination.
